note: This file is the entry point for all agent documentation. For operational memory, use the RAG/DB system in 11-intelligence.

agent_docs_index.purpose: Central index for all agent-generated documentation, logs, and collaborative memory.
agent_docs_index.file_usage: Files are for admin use, quick read, and redundant backup for DBs. Agents should use the RAG/DB system for all operational memory and collaboration.

sections.name: Agent Handoff Documents
sections.description: All handoff, summary, and transition documents between agents.

sections.description: Detailed execution plans, step-by-step logs, and implementation blueprints.

sections.name: Collaborative Logs
sections.description: Logs of agent collaboration, group chat, and multi-agent coordination.

sections.name: Standards & Reference
sections.description: Project standards, architecture, and reference manuals.

agent_docs_index.agent_memory_reference: For all agentic memory, context, and collaboration, use the RAG/DB system in 11-intelligence. Files are for backup and admin only.
